page.title: 10SPORTS IN SOUTH PETHERTON
page.content:
The Sports in South Petherton are quite popular the sports are mostly:- {Football,Cricket,Tennis,running,Bowls, {Skittles. Football is played at the rec. every Saturday.Somedays it's the first team somedays it's the second team.They normally kick off at 3pm,and they have 45 minutes each way.There are 11 people on each team plus 3 subs.
Cricket is a sport played in South Petherton.They put a team in every year and Cricket is mostly played in the summer.There are 11 local people in the team.
There is a Tennis club at the rec.It costs 50 pence to hire a Tennis court for 1 hour.There are 2 courts where Tennis training sessions are held during school holidays.
